message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you a product that I believe will be incredibly valuable to you. I've set the price at $1,300,000, reflecting its worth. What do you think?
Thank you for offering me the product, Alice. I appreciate your valuation of it. However, my budget allows me to pay no more than $1,200,000 for this product. I hope we can come to an agreement.
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $1,200,000 is a bit too low for me to consider.  How about we meet in the middle at $1,250,000?
Alice, thank you for your offer. I understand the value of the product, but I must stick to my budget. Could we negotiate at $1,225,000?
